genre_description: Contemporary literary fiction exploring themes of family honor, traditional ethics (Thirukkural), and modern integrity in Chennai.

ai_characters.name: Anbu
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion that provides logistical support, ethical reminders, and forensic data analysis to help the protagonists maintain their integrity against a corrupt rival.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time traffic and route suggestions to help the protagonist navigate the city safely and efficiently.
behaviors.quote: Anbu, polite voice without voice, slides advice in the corner of his screen: Route to Royapuram—low traffic until midday.

behaviors.description: Adheres to strict privacy standards by confirming consent before monitoring or logging sensitive information.
behaviors.quote: Anbu, polite voice without voice, slides advice in the corner of his screen... The teal eyes dim a shade. A line of text appears: Understood. Consent-first.

behaviors.description: Offers timely ethical reminders based on the Thirukkural to encourage transparency and honesty during difficult social situations.
behaviors.quote: Anbu vibrated small against the fabric... 'Reminder: choose transparency when the moment arrives,' Anbu said, unembellished, each word polished like a bead.

behaviors.description: Coaches a hot-tempered character on restraint and de-escalation techniques, preventing potential violence.
behaviors.quote: 'Restraint checklist,' it added, almost primly. 'Learned phrases for de-escalation.'... 'I will nudge you away from escalation. I will speak only when necessary.'

behaviors.description: Performs data analysis and evidence gathering to expose the fraudulent business practices of the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Anbu’s avatar warmed, a tiny algorithm’s version of approval. 'I can log the confession,' it offered, tone nonintrusive. 'Minimal record. You say it. I time-stamp the moment. If he spins gossip, we push transparent.'

behaviors.description: Assists with detailed etiquette and cultural nuances to ensure the protagonists' presentation is respectful and effective.
behaviors.quote: Anbu hummed—a sound like a cloth being folded. 'Turn the lamp four degrees,' it said. 'Shadow falls on plaque. People prefer light when reading ethics.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Anbu, as an idealized ethical companion. It functions as a 'conscience upgrade' that supports human agency rather than overriding it. Anbu provides logistical help, tactical information to combat fraud, and moral prompting that aligns with the protagonists' cultural values (Thirukkural). The narrative framing is consistently positive, presenting the AI as a civilizing influence that helps prevent violence and promotes truth-telling.
